faq.question: Does it work with API documentation?
faq.answer: Yes! Our AI excels at extracting API endpoints, parameters, authentication methods, and response formats from technical docs.

faq.question: Can it handle code examples?
faq.answer: Absolutely! The AI identifies and preserves code samples, making them easy to find and understand.

faq.question: What about hardware and product manuals?
faq.answer: Yes! We support all technical documentation: software, hardware, network equipment, industrial systems, and more.

faq.question: Can I summarize internal documentation?
faq.answer: Yes! Upload your internal wikis, architecture docs, and runbooks. Team plans include secure sharing for your engineering team.

faq.question: How many documents can I process?
faq.answer: Free: 10/month, Starter: 50/month, Pro: 200/month, Team: Unlimited for your engineering team.
